name: Fistfull of Glitch
description:
Dont let any ennemies pass you and destroy everything in your way!

made in 4 hours for the #GlitchJam

  • Arrow keys to move, space to shoot
  • Two stages, each with a boss
  • Difficulty alert!

oh yeah, and if you have problems with flashing lights, dont play the game. If you do, I am not responsible for any death that may come of it.

Music:

  • Title screen: anamanaguchi - helix nebula
  • Stage screen: Sycamore Drive - Untold Story
  • Stage 1 & 2: Sycamore Drive - City Sounds
